overview:
Serving as the Director of Investor Relations of Pitango Venture Capital, Rena was one of the first to join the Pitango team almost seventeen years ago.

In her capacity as Director of IR, Rena is the main contact between Pitango and its Limited Partners. In addition to organizing the Annual LP Event and Advisory Board meetings each year, she is instrumental in the preparation and distribution of the quarterly and annual reports that our LP’s receive. In addition, through various communications, Rena also works together with the Pitango team to facilitate the connection with our investors. Rena practiced law in the U.S. and Israel, and held senior positions in private law firms and within the banking industry.

Prior to joining Pitango, Rena was a member of the legal staff at Bank Leumi, one of Israel’s leading two banks.

She earned a B.A. in History (summa cum laude) and a Doctor of Jurisprudence degree (J.D.) in Law from the University of Texas.
